documentation.content:
## API Documentation - Adaptive Library

```APIDOC
adaptive.AverageLearner
adaptive.AverageLearner1D
adaptive.BaseLearner
adaptive.BalancingLearner
adaptive.DataSaver
adaptive.IntegratorLearner
adaptive.Learner1D
adaptive.Learner2D
adaptive.LearnerND
adaptive.SequenceLearner
adaptive.Runner
adaptive.AsyncRunner
adaptive.BlockingRunner
adaptive.runner.BaseRunner
adaptive.utils module
adaptive.notebook_integration module
```

## API Documentation - Adaptive Library

```APIDOC
adaptive.AverageLearner
adaptive.AverageLearner1D
adaptive.BaseLearner
adaptive.BalancingLearner
adaptive.DataSaver
adaptive.IntegratorLearner
adaptive.Learner1D
adaptive.Learner2D
adaptive.LearnerND
adaptive.SequenceLearner
adaptive.Runner
adaptive.AsyncRunner
adaptive.BlockingRunner
adaptive.runner.BaseRunner
adaptive.utils module
adaptive.notebook_integration module
```

## API Documentation: Adaptive Learners

```APIDOC
adaptive.AverageLearner:
  Represents an average learner, likely used for aggregating results or states.

adaptive.AverageLearner1D:
  A specialized average learner for 1-dimensional data.

adaptive.BaseLearner:
  The base class for all learners, defining the core interface and abstract methods.

adaptive.BalancingLearner:
  A learner designed for balancing exploration and exploitation in active learning.

adaptive.DataSaver:
  A learner responsible for saving or managing data collected during the learning process.

adaptive.IntegratorLearner:
  A learner that integrates or accumulates data, potentially for numerical integration tasks.

adaptive.Learner1D:
  A learner specifically designed for active learning on 1-dimensional functions.

adaptive.Learner2D:
  A learner specifically designed for active learning on 2-dimensional functions.

adaptive.LearnerND:
  A general learner for N-dimensional functions, providing flexibility for higher dimensions.

adaptive.SequenceLearner:
  A learner that processes data sequentially, suitable for time-series or ordered data.

adaptive.runner.BaseRunner:
  The base class for runner objects, which manage the execution of active learning loops.

adaptive.Runner:
  A concrete implementation of a runner for executing adaptive learning tasks.

adaptive.AsyncRunner:
  A runner that supports asynchronous execution of adaptive learning tasks.

adaptive.BlockingRunner:
  A runner that executes adaptive learning tasks in a blocking manner.
```
